title: Video Document-Based Mathematical Concept Learning Design Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A course for job seekers to strengthen mathematical job competencies, utilizing video documents linked to actual industrial settings.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze mathematical situations extracted from video documents to solve real-life problems.
Learners can understand the instructional design process based on instrumental generative theory and create step-by-step learning materials.
Learners can visually and descriptively express the application of mathematical concepts through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
